snippet: Jason Binn, the founder of DuJour magazine, had met Mr. Sterling in the past. His advice to reporters sniffing for a story: “Just pick up the phone.”
abstract: Luxury and fashion magazine DuJour founder Jason Binn has exclusive chat with Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling, who was recorded making racist remarks.
lead_paragraph: Jason Binn, the founder of DuJour magazine, had met Mr. Sterling in the past. His advice to reporters sniffing for a story: “Just pick up the phone.”

headline.main: For Luxury Magazine, an Unusual Exclusive
headline.print_headline: For Luxury Magazine, an Unusual Exclusive
